Name: BangBangShooting
About the game: This is a top-down shooting + roguelike elements in a game, players can operate the hero to fight freely, using a wealth of weapon and skills to eliminate the enemy wave after wave of attack. Game features: -Form unique tactics by matching different skills! -Get different weapons in battle! -Weapons come with skills, making it easier for players to match the skills they need!
